title: riot should make a rune skinline
body:
showing what certain champions would look/be like if they got a hold of certain powerful runes, called 'rune holder'? maybe?  'rune born' ?? 

for example 
rune holder darius
rune holder riven
rune holder xerath
rune holder kayn
ect.

replies.body: Yeah, isn't that what Runeborn Xerath is kind of showing? So they could add more on to that theme.

Well.

We do have skins like Runeborn Xerath and Earthrune Skarner if they count.
I dig it but I think the line would have to be restricted to people with some form of transformation or trigger so like when darius hits 5 stacks he "activates the rune" and changes.

> [{quoted}](name=Très Pauvre,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FR8YYQdH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-27T16:51:26.797+0000)
>
> I dig it but I think the line would have to be restricted to people with some form of transformation or trigger so like when darius hits 5 stacks he "activates the rune" and changes.

so like {{champion:122}} (passive 5 stacks - rune empowers him), {{champion:28}} (passive demon shade - rune corrupts her appearance), {{champion:141}} (Passive - either empowered or corrupted), {{champion:76}} and {{champion:60}} (rune transforms them)?

Would be great if everyone of them would use another world rune with unique powers. :o

{{champion:254}} The rune is water is stuck in her back (instead of the energy crystal right now). Her gloves are made out of water, her E lets her splash water in front of her.
{{champion:154}} The rune of earth is stuck in his body, he is no longer liquid, but an ensemble of sand and rocks.
